EmailTemplate.description: Thank you letter for registering to attend the OH PDS - Oct 2007
EmailTemplate.name: Partnership Dialogue Series - OH - Thank you for Registering - Oct 2007
EmailTemplate.subject: Registration Confirmation to attend ASA's Partnership Dialogue Series!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for registering to attend ASAâ€™s Partnership Dialogue Series: A Focus on Communication.
Date: Friday, October 19, 2007 Start Time: 8:30 am Location: Central State University Room 126, The Center for Education and Natural Science 1400 Brush Row Road Wilberforce, OH 45384 http://www.centralstate.edu/services/directions_map/map_csuwest.html#directions
Canceling Your Registration If you need to cancel or change your registration please email training@amsa.com or 1-800-999-9080, ext. 3099.
We look forward to seeing you!
